channel.title: hibernate on Cupper
channel.description: Recent content in hibernate on Cupper

item.title: Hibernate Mappings & Encapsulated Collections
item.description: Collections must be encapsulated. Also I am using Hibernate as the persistence solution. I have a uni-directional many to many relationship between Parent and Child. My java code looks like this: Parent { String name; Set children = new HashSet(); public void getChildren() { return Collections.unmodifiableCollection(children); } private void setChildren(Set children) { this.children = children; } public void addChild(Child obj) { ///..... } public void removeChild(Child obj) { ///.... } } Child { String name; //.
